profile.name: Ali Rajab
profile.headline: Software Engineer III | Product Manager | Mobile Application Developer | Flutter | Java | Web Developer | Laravel | React.js | Vue.js | Junior Blockchain Developer | Solidity | Python
profile.summary:
A Lead Software Engineer with over five years of professional experience, I have a proven track record in software development across various domains, including scientific research.

I excel at leading teams, developing cost-efficient solutions, and enhancing productivity through effective project management and clear communication.

My technical expertise spans mobile application development, web development, and database management, with a strong focus on delivering high-quality, scalable systems.

I am passionate about working on projects that have a significant impact and benefit millions of users.

My collaborative approach, combined with my technical skills, allows me to create solutions that improve user experience and operational efficiency.

Key Skills:
Project Management: Agile methodologies, ClickUp, Jira
Mobile Development: Flutter, Dart, Java, UI/UX design, REST API integration, Firebase
Web Development: C#, .Net core, PHP, Laravel, JavaScript, Node.js, Vue.js, HTML/CSS, AWS
Database Management: SQL Server, MySQL, SQLite, PostgreSQL, MongoDB

Fluent in both Arabic and English, I am committed to continuous learning and professional growth.

For more about my work and to connect, visit my Linktree.

experience.description:
- Supervised a team of 9 developers to effectively manage a delivery system, ensuring seamless operations and delivery of high-quality applications.

- Developed cost-efficient solutions, optimizing resource utilization and saving over $1000.

- Distributed tasks among team members, monitored progress, and addressed challenges to maintain project timelines, resulting in a 50% productivity increase.

- Acted as a liaison between the development team and stakeholders, ensuring clear communication and goal alignment, boosting productivity by 75%.

- Enhanced the server performance decreasing the load by 80% by editing 10+ APIs.

- Tech: ClickUp, Flutter, Laravel, Linux, Github, JMeter

experience.company: Balafrreen Travel and Education Services Company Ltd.
experience.description:
- Improved data accessibility by 80% and server performance by 50%, reducing latency through collaboration with the backend team.

- Analyzed and processed over 10,000 rows of data for flight, airport, and airline, optimizing app display.

- Collaborated with the UI/UX team to enhance user experience, benefiting over 10,000 app users.

- Increased app user base by 35% by integrating Google, Apple, and Facebook sign-in options.

- Managed the app’s lifecycle from development to launch on the App Store and Google Play, ensuring a seamless user journey.

- Tech: Flutter, AWS, Google Play, App Store, Node.js

- Created the required UML diagrams and ERD database diagram (+5) to meet stakeholders’ requirements and achieve scalable and maintainable system.

- Worked with a 2-person team to implement backend and frontend requirements. v

- Implemented FCM to automatically notify clients upon complaint resolution, reducing follow-up calls by 40% and improving customer satisfaction scores by 50%.

- Tech: Ionic Framework, Visual Paradigm, MySQL, Laravel, Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM)

education.degree: MPhil, Software Engineering and Information Systems

projects.title: Flight Ticket Reservation System
projects.description:
- Built a dashboard for administrators to manage flights, reservations, users, and thier roles(+3).

- Enabled users to search among flights, make reservations, and manage their reservations.

- Utilized the Code-First approach to design and manage a database with 6+ tables in MSSQL.

- Implemented Razor page model for managing 15+ website pages and their associated logic.

- Added multilingual support for Arabic and English, catering to a diverse user base.

certifications: Thanks letter from The General Electricity Company
